content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Below is a list of the NetSPI IP addresses that scan monster and other activities should originate from. If you conduct testing from other IPs, please be sure to document them here.

Scan network (AWS):
3.209.252.210/32;
34.225.243.190/32

Scan network (on premise): WebInspect, Nessus, Nexpose, Scan VMs
Note: On premise scanning infrastructure.
Verizon (End of life November 2021)
209.118.108.194
2610:18:8bc1:319::/64

Main office network: Burp and local manual testing from office
Verizon (End of life November 2021)
209.118.132.165 is the outbound gateway for the MPLS office network.

Remote VPN network: Burp and manual testing from home on no-split
Verizon (End of life November 2021)
209.118.108.195

Virtual Networks:
Verizon (End of life November 2021)
209.118.108.19 is the outbound gateway for all the 10.2.2.0/24 addresses.
